attributes.additional_details:
Our streets were a safe place to walk but now you have to look over your shoulder.
 Women are being attacked for no reason. 
Teens running wild stabbing people. 
Our prisons are not deterring this behaviour. 
We need a deterrent bring back the death penalty and get Briton safe again.
attributes.background: I ask parliament to consider reinstate the death penalty in the uk for child killers, terorist bombers and knife crime. Our country was a safe place to walk the streets but now it’s not. Putting murders away for 30 to 100 years is expensive. Why should the taxpayers pay for there crimes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357

Reintroduce the death penalty for people found guilty of terrorism
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710686

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
